name: LEFT 4 DEAD -生存者たち-
summary:
Left 4 Dead: Survivors (LEFT 4 DEAD -生存者たち-) also known as Left 4 Dead: Arcade (L4DAC) is a Japanese version of Left 4 Dead 2 redesigned for Japanese arcades, featuring an entirely new cast of survivors.

The game still takes place in the United States featuring the same scenarios from Left 4 Dead and Left 4 Dead 2, but the characters are seemingly designed to appeal to a Japanese audience.
